name: template_sasonly
description: The template used by SASjs when running `sasjs create myProject -t jobs`

scripts.exec: sasjs job execute jobs/demo/makedata1 -l sasjsbuild/makedata1.log -t viya
scripts.flow: sasjs flow execute -s sasjs/jobflow.json -l sasjsbuild --csvFile sasjsbuild/results.csv -t viya
